explains: adj. 使清洁的，（与）清洁添加剂（有关）的
wordGroup: laundry detergent 洗衣粉；洗衣精
synthetic detergent n. [化]合成洗涤剂
liquid detergent 洗涤液，液体洗涤剂
neutral detergent 中性洗涤剂，中性去污剂

sentences.en: The detergent comes in powder or liquid form.
sentences.cn: 这种洗涤剂有粉状或液态两种。

sentences.en: This detergent is good for getting stains out.
sentences.cn: 这种洗涤剂能清除斑渍。

sentences.en: Grease marks can be removed with liquid detergent.
